channel.title: ORM on Elastic Mint
channel.description: Recent content in ORM on Elastic Mint

item.title: Do We Still Need Orms?
item.description: Do you remember the first time you used an ORM (Object Relational Mapper)? For me it was something I wrote to make it easier to map data related to testing electronic devices into a SQL database. Different devices generated different test data, and so I used a convention to map the property names on the classes to the SQL tables and columns. At the time I didn’t even know what an ORM was.
